text: The Actor's Children is a 1910 American silent drama movie directed by Barry O'Neil and stars Frank H. Crane, Orilla Smith, and Yale Boss. ==Actors== * Frank H. Crane as the actor (adult male lead) * Orilla Smith as the actor's daughter (little girl) * Yale Boss as the actor's son (little boy) * Nicholas Jordan as a comedian ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movies Category:1910 movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies
title: The Actor's Children
